title: RENOVA | Quality Home Renovation Services in Edmonds
description: Explore RENOVA's premier home renovation services in Edmonds. From custom kitchen remodels to bathroom renovations, our expert team ensures quality and innovation.

imageTextSection.phrase: Crafting beautiful homes in Edmonds with precision and style
imageTextSection.paragraph1: Discover RENOVA's exceptional home renovation services in Edmonds. Our experienced team specializes in a variety of services, including custom kitchen remodels, bathroom renovations, and whole-home makeovers. We combine innovative design with expert craftsmanship to bring your vision to life. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction ensures every project is completed to the highest standards.
imageTextSection.paragraph2: At RENOVA, we understand the specific needs of Edmonds homeowners. Whether you're looking to update a single room or undertake a comprehensive renovation, our team is here to guide you through every step. From the initial consultation to the final walkthrough, we prioritize clear communication and transparency to make your renovation experience smooth and enjoyable.

aboutSection.markdown:
### Dedicated to Quality and Innovation

Since 2011, RENOVA has been transforming homes in Edmonds with exceptional renovation services. Our team combines years of experience with a commitment to excellence in every project we undertake. We focus on delivering superior craftsmanship and innovative solutions that exceed our clients' expectations.

**Our Values:** We believe in creating spaces that are not only beautiful but also functional. Our approach is centered around collaboration, quality materials, and personalized solutions tailored to each client's needs. This dedication to detail ensures that every project is a perfect fit for your home and lifestyle.

**Our Experience:** With a rich history in the industry, our skilled professionals bring a wealth of knowledge to every renovation. We handle everything from initial design to final construction, ensuring a seamless process and outstanding results. Choose RENOVA for your next home renovation project and experience the difference our expertise makes.

Our comprehensive services range from kitchen remodels and bathroom renovations to complete home makeovers. We pride ourselves on delivering quality workmanship and exceptional customer service. Whether you're looking to update a single room or transform your entire home, RENOVA is here to help. Let us turn your renovation dreams into reality with our personalized and professional services.
about.section2P1: At RENOVA, we follow a meticulous process to ensure your renovation project runs smoothly from start to finish. It begins with an initial consultation where we discuss your goals, budget, and timeline. Our design phase includes creating detailed plans and presenting them for your feedback. We handle all permits and approvals, source quality materials, and coordinate every aspect of the construction phase.
about.section2P2: Throughout the renovation, we maintain clear communication and provide regular updates. Our team is dedicated to minimizing disruptions and ensuring the highest standards of safety and cleanliness. The project concludes with a final walkthrough to ensure every detail meets your satisfaction. RENOVA's comprehensive approach guarantees a seamless and enjoyable renovation experience.

section2H2: Custom Bathrooms and Beyond: What We Offer
section2P1: At RENOVA, we specialize in creating custom bathrooms that combine style and functionality. Our team works with you to design a space that meets your needs and complements your home's aesthetic. We offer a range of services, including tub to shower conversions, vanity installations, and complete bathroom remodels. Our attention to detail and commitment to quality ensure a bathroom that you'll love for years to come.
section2P2: In addition to bathrooms, RENOVA offers a variety of renovation services to enhance your entire home. From kitchen makeovers and basement finishing to custom home additions, we have the expertise to handle projects of all sizes. Our comprehensive approach includes design, material selection, and construction, making us your one-stop-shop for all your home improvement needs.

description.p1: Discuss project scope, budget, and timeline.
description.p2: Assess the existing space and take measurements.
description.p3: Identify client needs, preferences, and goals.

description.p1: Develop initial design concepts and layouts.
description.p2: Create detailed architectural and engineering plans.
description.p3: Present design options to the client for feedback and approval.

description.p1: Prepare a detailed cost estimate for the project.
description.p2: Review and finalize the budget with the client.
description.p3: Adjust the design or scope if needed to fit the budget.

description.p1: Submit necessary plans and applications to local authorities.
description.p2: Obtain building permits and any other required approvals.
description.p3: Address any revisions or additional requirements from authorities.

description.p1: Choose materials, fixtures, and finishes (e.g., flooring, cabinets, countertops).
description.p2: Source and order all necessary materials.

description.p1: Develop a detailed project timeline and schedule.
description.p3: Set milestones and deadlines for each phase of the project.

description.p2: Set up temporary utilities or structures as needed.
description.p3: Protect existing structures and surfaces from damage.

description.p1: Safely remove existing structures, fixtures, and finishes.
description.p2: Dispose of debris and waste in accordance with regulations.
description.p3: Ensure a clean and safe worksite during demolition.

description.p1: Execute construction work as per the design plan.
description.p2: Install new structures, systems, and finishes.
description.p3: Ensure quality and compliance with building codes.

description.p1: Conduct a final walkthrough with the client.
description.p2: Identify any remaining tasks or touch-ups (punch list) and complete them.
description.p3: Finalize all work, clean the site, and hand over the remodeled space to the client.

markdown1:
## Premier Home Improvement Services in Edmonds, WA

At RENOVA, we are dedicated to providing top-quality home improvement services tailored to the unique needs of homeowners in Edmonds, WA. Our team of experienced professionals ensures that every project is completed to the highest standards, enhancing both the beauty and functionality of your home.

### Our Services

#### Kitchen Renovations
Our kitchen renovations in Edmonds focus on creating modern, functional, and aesthetically pleasing spaces. We offer:

- **Custom cabinetry**: Maximize storage and style with our bespoke designs.
- **Quartz countertops**: Durable, elegant surfaces that resist stains and scratches.
- **Advanced appliances**: Integrate the latest technology for convenience and efficiency.
- **Kitchen island installation**: Adding both workspace and seating.
- **Backsplash tile**: Enhancing the look and feel of your kitchen.

#### Bathroom Remodeling
Transform your bathroom into a luxurious retreat with our expert remodeling services. We provide:

- **Walk-in showers**: Spacious and elegant, offering a seamless look.
- **Heated floors**: Adding warmth and comfort.
- **High-end fixtures**: Enhancing sophistication and durability.
- **Bathtub replacement**: Offering both style and function.

#### Basement and Attic Finishing
Unlock the full potential of your home with our basement and attic finishing services. These areas can be transformed into functional and inviting spaces, adding value and versatility to your home. Services include:

- **Basement waterproofing**: Preventing moisture and mold.
- **Attic insulation**: Ensuring energy efficiency.
- **Entertainment centers**: Creating spaces for family fun.
- **Basement bar installation**: Adding a touch of luxury and entertainment.

#### Exterior Enhancements
Enhance your home's curb appeal with our exterior renovation services. We offer:

- **Contemporary siding options**: Including vinyl, cedar, and composite materials.
- **Energy-efficient windows**: Improving insulation and reducing energy costs.
- **Custom decks**: Creating outdoor spaces for relaxation and entertainment.
- **Landscape lighting**: Highlighting your home's features beautifully.
- **Roof replacement**: Ensuring durability and protection.

##### Quality Craftsmanship
At RENOVA, we prioritize quality craftsmanship and attention to detail in every project. Our team ensures every aspect of your renovation is executed to the highest standards, resulting in a beautiful and functional home.
markdown2:
## Overcoming Renovation Challenges in Edmonds, WA

Home renovations in Edmonds, WA, come with their own set of unique challenges. At RENOVA, we are well-prepared to handle these obstacles, ensuring your project runs smoothly from start to finish.

### Common Challenges

#### Climate Concerns
Edmonds' coastal climate can present several challenges, particularly related to moisture and temperature variations. These can lead to:

- **Basement moisture**: Risking structural damage and mold growth if not properly managed.
- **Roofing wear**: Due to heavy rains and fluctuating temperatures, leading to leaks and potential damage.
- **Exterior siding wear**: Moisture can affect the longevity of your siding.

#### Structural Limitations
Older homes in Edmonds may have structural limitations that complicate renovations. These can include:

- **Outdated wiring and plumbing**: Necessitating careful updates to meet modern standards.
- **Foundation issues**: Requiring repair or reinforcement to support new additions or modifications.
- **Seismic retrofitting needs**: Enhancing the structure to withstand earthquakes.

#### Regulatory Hurdles
Navigating local building codes and regulations can be complex. Potential pitfalls include:

- **Permitting processes**: Often time-consuming, requiring detailed documentation.
- **Zoning laws**: Limiting certain types of renovations or additions, demanding careful planning and adherence to guidelines.

##### Tackling the Challenges
At RENOVA, our experienced team excels at anticipating and overcoming these challenges. We use high-quality materials and advanced techniques to address climate-related issues, ensure structural integrity, and navigate regulatory requirements efficiently. Our goal is to provide a seamless renovation experience, regardless of the obstacles.

faqItems.question: How to find a contractor for small jobs?
faqItems.answer: Finding a contractor for small jobs can be done by researching local renovation companies, reading reviews, and asking for recommendations from friends and family. RENOVA offers services for projects of all sizes, ensuring quality and reliability.

faqItems.question: How to hire a contractor?
faqItems.answer: To hire a contractor, start by identifying your project needs and budget. Research potential contractors, check their credentials, and ask for references. Schedule consultations to discuss your project and get quotes. RENOVA provides transparent and detailed consultations to help you make an informed decision.

faqItems.question: Do I need a general contractor for a bathroom remodel?
faqItems.answer: A general contractor is highly recommended for a bathroom remodel to manage all aspects of the project, from design to construction. RENOVA's experienced team ensures a smooth and efficient remodel, handling everything from permits to final touches.

faqItems.question: How much does a kitchen remodel cost?
faqItems.answer: The cost of a kitchen remodel varies based on the scope of the project, materials, and design choices. On average, a kitchen remodel can range from $20,000 to $50,000. RENOVA offers customized solutions to fit your budget and needs.

faqItems.question: Can I deduct remodeling expenses for rental property?
faqItems.answer: Yes, you can deduct certain remodeling expenses for rental properties as they are considered capital improvements. Consult with a tax professional to understand which expenses are deductible. RENOVA provides detailed invoices to help you with your tax deductions.

markdown3:
## RENOVA: Excellence in Home Improvement for Edmonds, WA

RENOVA is committed to transforming homes in Edmonds, WA, by incorporating the latest design trends and addressing unique local challenges. Our expertise and dedication to quality make us the ideal choice for all your home renovation needs.

### Embracing Design Trends
We stay updated with the latest design trends to ensure your home is both stylish and functional. Popular trends in Edmonds include:

- **Open-concept living spaces**: Enhancing flow and natural light.
- **Modern kitchens with quartz countertops**: Combining elegance and durability.
- **Luxurious bathrooms with walk-in showers and heated floors**: Creating spa-like retreats.
- **Smart home features**: Integrating technology for a more convenient lifestyle.
- **Eco-friendly materials**: Emphasizing sustainability in design.

#### Open-Concept Living Spaces
Creating open-concept living spaces helps foster social interaction and allows for more natural light. This trend is perfect for modern lifestyles, making your home feel more spacious and connected.

#### Sleek Kitchen Designs
Our kitchen remodels focus on sleek, contemporary designs. Quartz countertops, custom cabinets, and modern appliances are key features that enhance both functionality and visual appeal, making your kitchen a centerpiece of your home.

#### Luxurious Bathrooms
Transforming bathrooms into luxurious retreats is a major trend in Edmonds. Features like walk-in showers, heated floors, and designer fixtures create a spa-like experience that adds comfort and value to your home.

### Our Expertise
With years of experience in the industry, RENOVA is equipped to handle any renovation project. Our skilled team combines technical proficiency with creative vision to deliver exceptional results. We ensure that every project is completed to the highest standards, reflecting our commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction.

###### General Information
RENOVA offers a broad spectrum of home improvement services in Edmonds. From kitchen and bathroom remodels to attic and exterior renovations, our expert team is dedicated to delivering superior results. We prioritize customer satisfaction and high-quality workmanship, ensuring your home is both beautiful and functional.
